text.text_translated:
Management means leading and organising people in a company.  
Reinforcement means giving praise to help people do well.  
Recognition means saying thank you to show people you see their good work.  
Investment means using money or time to help something grow or get better.  
Development means learning new skills or getting better at something.  
Communication means sharing ideas and information with others.  
Environment means the place where people work.  

Girox Foods should use a people-focused way to manage staff.  
They want to try new ideas to help workers.  
One idea is to let people choose their work hours.  
Another is to let workers work from places they want, like home.  
Managers need to find ways to give positive praise to staff.  
They should say thank you when workers do good work.  
Girox Foods should spend time and money to help workers learn.  
It is good to teach workers how to talk with different people and cultures.  
This will help workers do their best and feel happy at work.

best_attempt.text_translated:
Management means the way people lead and organise a group or a company.  
Reinforcement means giving support or praise to help people do well.  
Recognition means saying thank you or showing people you see their good work.  
Investment means using money or time to help something grow or get better.  
Development means learning new skills or getting better at something.  
Communication means sharing ideas and information with other people.  
Environment means the place where people work or live.

Girox Foods should change how it manages people.  
They want to try new ideas to help workers.  
One idea is to let people choose when they work.  
Another idea is to let people work from home or other places.  
Managers should find ways to help staff feel good about their work.  
They should tell people when they do well.  
Girox Foods should spend money and time to help workers learn.  
It is good to teach workers how to talk with many kinds of people.  
This will help workers work well and feel happy at work.
